name: Kangaskhan
description: The Parent Pokémon. Raises its young in its belly pouch. Won’t run from any fight to keep its young protected.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: This Pokémon has advantage on rolls to wake from sleep.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.description: This Pokémon's Normal and Fighting type moves ignore immunities granted by a Pokémon's type. If a target’s secondary type gives it vulnerability or resistance to the attack, it follows the secondary type for that effect.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.
